thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Monday, 29 Jan 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: BRIEF-Tunghsu Azure Renewable Energy Sees 2017 Net Profit To Rise, Unit Wins PPP Project

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Tunghsu Azure Renewable Energy Sees 2017 Net Profit To Rise, Unit Wins PPP Project

organizations.name: tunghsu azure renewable energy co ltd

text:
Jan 29 (Reuters) - Tunghsu Azure Renewable Energy Co Ltd :
* SAYS IT EXPECTS 2017 NET PROFIT TO RISE 205-242 PERCENT Y/Y VERSUS 175.4 MILLION YUAN ($27.72 million) YEAR AGO
* SAYS UNIT WINS AGRICULTURAL PARK PPP PROJECT WITH INVESTMENT OF ABOUT 1.2 BILLION YUAN Source text in Chinese: bit.ly/2nnmZH7 ; bit.ly/2DJOQIz Further company coverage: ($1 = 6.3270 Chinese yuan renminbi) (Reporting by Hong Kong newsroom)
